author: Rob Coupland
comment: Forecasting weather is not easy, accurate forecasting is probably limited to 6 hours in advance.  So like most apps its only as good as the data that feeds it. I will say that it was excellent when I was in the US tracking the hurricanes, Katrina, Irma etc.  Consistantly better than other apps on my wife and daughters phones

author: Michael Mertz
comment: Although the app itself is a very good app that i would love to give 5 stares for, the low rateing is due to the unrelentless advertising that is forced into your phone. Opting out is not a compleat fix.. If they get out of the advertising push i would gladly re install it.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience. You can get Premium subscription and get rid of ads. In addition, the subscription allows full access to radar map. Thank you in advance!

author: Emma Johnson
comment: It's raining hard and Weather App says 10% chance of raining. I am going to try this for a couple days but I feel it will be deleted very soon.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We would like to provide more precise data for our users so in case you are facing weather inaccuracies please let us know weather details for the selected location. For this please swipe up the main screen of the app until you see Report Weather box. Select the current state of sky & clouds and precipitation in your location, then tap Send.

comment: Does not locate where you Are, guesses the weather by showing snow every other hour for 24 hours. Total rubbish and waste of money

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We would like to provide more precise data for our users so in case you are facing weather inaccuracies please let us know weather details for the selected location. For this please swipe up the main screen of the app until you see Report Weather box. Select the current state of sky & clouds and precipitation in your location, then tap Send.

comment: A little worrying that the reply given wasn't appropriate to the matter I raised. The problem was NOT about accurate weather reporting but that tha app has a set response to good visability which it always interprets as GOOD driving weather. This could be DANGEROUS. It should take into account of ICE and HIGH WINDS too. This is a SAFETY MATTER so please address this promptly with an update.  Hope this updated review helps.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your comment and will consider it while working on future versions of the app. If you have any further suggestions or ideas - please let us know at support@apalon.com. Thank you in advance!

author: S.P.K SR.
comment: Installed the widget and everything looked great.. Graphics looked amazing and I was happy.  Two days after installing the app, the widget started looking crazy.. It no longer displayed anything.. No info, just the silloette of the widget background

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please restart your device and try to set widget once again.

author: Kevin Dame
comment: After starting up, asked me to buy the full thing. Annoying from the beginning. Deleted. Don't waste your time.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your comment and will consider it while working on future versions of the app. If you have any further suggestions or ideas - please let us know. Thank you in advance!

author: Linda Pollasch
comment: I had high expectations...love weather info and love the beautiful way it was presented.  Unfortunately, it was really inaccurate a bunch of times.  I'm sorry to cancel because I really wanted it's format.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We would like to provide more precise data for our users so in case you are facing weather inaccuracies please let us know weather details for the selected location. For this please swipe up the main screen of the app until you see Report Weather box. Select the current state of sky & clouds and precipitation in your location, then tap Send.

author: Company 7
comment: Fancy looking but very inaccurate nearest terrible snow where I live now  UK is going for a terrible snow storm and this app shows it as partly cloudy  it's ridiculous  I have 5 weather apps  and this one by far is the worst and most inaccurate  it is nothing other than that fancy gimmick  do not buy professional save your pennies my other weather app is less fancy and 90% more accurate,  I do not rate this app

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: Could you please specify the exact location where you observe this? What is the actual weather that you see and when did it happen? Thank you in advance for your answer.

author: Andrew Page
comment: Pretty good most of the time with a lot of detail but live weather is not always correct. Not bad app but if weather accuracy compared with other apps would be 5*.

author: Frank N.
comment: Love this app it's easy to use. I have checked the weather from all over. I can check the wrath where my love ones and friends are, Montreal, Puerto Rico, Missouri and other countries. I'm telling you it's really great try it and see too. Thank you

author: Julie Brossman
comment: Love this app to keep up to date on hourly and future forecasts. Helped me keep track of the Hurricane progress in Miami where my son's live since I am in Pennsylvania.

author: Andrew Birch
comment: Says I'm in a blizzard, it's sunny, it hasn't got a clue what the weather is doing live let alone forecasting it! Sucks the life out of your phone battery like a vampire sucking blood, it looks pretty, but that is as far as it goes

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We would like to provide more precise data for our users so in case you are facing weather inaccuracies please let us know weather details for the selected location. For this please swipe up the main screen of the app until you see Report Weather box. Select the current state of sky & clouds and precipitation in your location, then tap Send.

author: Carol O'brien
comment: It gives you all the information that you need . and the weather background is very accurate. Its snowing like mad outside. And the app is correct

author: Josephine Clayton
comment: Have used this app for a while now and I love it, would not think of changing. It is still beautiful and useful. Top marks!

author: farley uy
comment: The weather radar map and rain map is not working again, network error occured, kindly check, your app is not working properly.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We appreciate if you could contact our support service (support@apalon.com) with a more detailed description of the issue so that we could try to resolve it for you. Thank you in advance for your cooperation!

comment: I rely upon this information to be able to get through the day and be prepared for any changes that might occur, Thanks

author: Carl Ketchum
comment: Accurate and concise information waited up days but I'm always having to click on it to get it update. has really nice widgets works on my Samsung Galaxy 6 it also has widgets that show you the time with the weather forecast and you can also set your alarm with it check it out it's worth it.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: If you have any type of antivirus or battery saving software installed on your device - please make sure that it does not interfere with the work of the app. If the issue continues - please let us know at support@apalon.com. Thank you in advance!

author: Judy G
comment: At the moment there is nothing on the display but my location.  If it doesn't start working very soon I'm deleting this paid version.  Big waste of money and time!

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We appreciate if you could contact our support service (support@apalon.com) with a more detailed description of the issue so that we could try to resolve it for you. Thank you in advance for your cooperation!

author: Mike Yount
comment: The ap seems to be very accurate and the graphic interface works well. A few ads pop up but not a deal breaker.
This is the perfect app for people who travel like me, I can pull up the app and it gives me up to date info on the spot. It's a win/win situation for me, two-tone I love it!➕➕🅰🅰🅰➕➕

author: Garred Arviso
comment: Excellent weather icons, all is very detail.  App is in good condition

author: Peter Fish
comment: The ads are so intrusive and frequent that the whole experience is spoilt. Also no more accurate than other apps.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience. You can get Premium subscription and get rid of ads. In addition, the subscription allows full access to radar map. Thank you in advance!

author: Roger Waldram
comment: Excellent for extremely local weather & close to 100% accuracy even with our really weird French weather!

author: Paul Naylor
comment: Misleading this is not free you have to pay for this 👎

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience. If you are not ready to get a paid version yet you can continue using a free version as long as you want to. Note, there's a free trial. Don't forget to check the subscription due dates in your Google Play account . Have a nice day!

author: Steven bump
comment: Best one yet. I love it ,but it needs to have the precipitation in inches (snow & rain) my only complaint.

author: Tina Bowers
comment: I like this app, but it doesn't update every half hour like I set it to do. Even when I refresh it.

author: Desmond Locker
comment: Accurate and enjoyable. Plenty of useful info. Thanks for a great app.

author: Crystal Clarke
comment: I don't like it it let me pay to download weatherfull cast I want a refund

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: For assistance on refunds contact us at support@apalon.com with the order number from your receipt. Thank you in advance!

author: Daniel Abernethy
comment: Looking at it snowing, app says partly sunny. All cloudy and snowy, lame.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: We would like to provide more precise data for our users so in case you are facing weather inaccuracies please let us know weather details for the selected location. For this please swipe up the main screen of the app until you see Report Weather box. Select the current state of sky & clouds and precipitation in your location, then tap Send.

author: dawn coviello
comment: I will delete after 7 days...too much when there are so many free weather apps.
Too many ads. And they are full screen ads that block the app. Not good.

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience. You can get Premium subscription and get rid of ads. In addition, the subscription allows full access to radar map. Thank you in advance!

author: Chirag Bhanushali
comment: Misleading name. Its a paid app with 7 day trial demo.

author: Engleman Bluenose
comment: Nice weather app. But on a very Sunny morning displayed partly cloudy

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: If the forecast data is incorrect - please try to update the data manually by pulling down the main screen of the app. If this does not help - please let us know the name of the location with an incorrect forecast. You can write us here or contact us via e-mail address support@apalon.com.

author: Teguh Wijaya
comment: Sucked, push me to pay the premium feature at trial periods. Beware!!!

reply.author: Apalon Apps
reply.content: You can use the free version as long as you would like to. App Does not require to purchase the premium. This is an optional feature.

author: Mohayudhin Khodabux
comment: ITS  VERY NICE I CAN GET THE STORM

author: Philip Walper
comment: This app is great and it's such a GREAT deal for the yearly cost!!!
Just got the app don't know much about it yet.

author: Sallie Bow
comment: Most accurate weather app for my town. Love that I can give instant correction if the info isn't right at my location By CT

author: Joe Jacono
comment: Good so far for the free version.
